trans-unit.source: Defines the metadata attribute that task authors use to identify whether the task requires a specific version of the CLR runtime.
trans-unit.target: 定义任务作者用于标识任务是否求特定版本的 CLR 运行时的元数据特性。

trans-unit.source: A task marked with the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.RequiredRuntimeAttribute> indicates that it has a stricter runtime requirement than a regular task.
trans-unit.target: 任务标记为<xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.RequiredRuntimeAttribute>指示它具有更严格的运行时要求比常规任务。

trans-unit.source: It alerts MSBuild that it may need to start a separate process for the task if the current CLR runtime version does not match the required version.
trans-unit.target: 它会提示 MSBuild，它可能需要启动任务单独的进程，如果当前的 CLR 运行时版本不匹配所需的版本。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is currently non-functional because only one version of the CLR (2.0) is capable of running either [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] version 2.0 or 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 因为只有一个版本的 CLR (2.0) 能够运行的，此属性是当前的非功能性[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]2.0 或 3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Extending Metadata Using Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[利用特性扩展元数据](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The version of the CLR runtime required prefaced with a "v," such as "v2.0."
trans-unit.target: 所需的 CLR 运行时的版本，以“v”开头，例如“v2.0”。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.RequiredRuntimeAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.RequiredRuntimeAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the CLR runtime version the attribute was constructed with, such as "v2.0."
trans-unit.target: 获取构造特性时所使用的 CLR 运行时版本，例如“v2.0”。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the CLR runtime version required.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含所需的 CLR 运行时版本。
